abstract: The assent was the last major hurdle the $8.5 billion deal faced after American regulators approved the transaction in June.
snippet: The assent was the last major hurdle the $8.5 billion deal faced after American regulators approved the transaction in June.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — The European Commission on Friday approved Microsoft’s $8.5 billion purchase of Skype, saying it had no objections to a deal that would link the world’s largest software maker with the leading Internet communications service.

headline.main: Europe Approves Microsoft Purchase of Skype
headline.print_headline: European Commission Backs Microsoft Deal to Buy Skype
